items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

list.label: 5% Rebate in Cart on Premium Brands

content.body:
### Shop 285/55R20 Tire Size
285/55R20 tires are a plus sized version of 255/70R18 tires, and typically found on a Toyota Tundra. If you drive a 2012-2021 model year Tundra, then 285/55R20 tires are your plus sized option.

Popular vehicles
2012-2021 Toyota Tundra

Plus sized tires are commonly used to add ground clearance to a truck for off-road driving. Because of this, drivers need a tire that’s able to perform off-road which makes mud terrain tires a great match. Check out the [Hankook Dynapro MT2 RT05](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/dynapro-mt2-rt05), Mickey Thompson Baja Boss M/T, Nitto Trail Grappler M/T, or Nexen Roadian MTX if you need a set of 285/55R20 mud tires for your ride.

Some drivers might only do a little bit of off-road driving, so they might want something that’s a bit better on paved roads than a mud terrain tire. All-terrain tires are built for on- and off-road performance, so take a look at the BFGoodrich All-Terrain T/A KO2, [Pirelli Scorpion All Terrain Plus](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/scorpion-all-terrain-plus), Yokohama Geolandar AT G015, or Toyo Open Country A/T II if you want a set of 285/55R20 all-terrain tires.

Whether you want an all-terrain or mud terrain tire for your plus sized truck, SimpleTire has a set of 285/55R20 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
